title: 能启动客户端..可是没加入forge,求助
author: a8105
txt_content:
java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -Djava.library.path=F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft
atives -cp F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\libraries
et\minecraftforge\minecraftforge\9.11.1.965\minecraftforge-9.11.1.965.jar;F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\libraries

et\java\jutils\jutils\1.0.0\jutils-1.0.0.jar;F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.2.2\gson-2.2.2.jar;F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl\2.9.0\lwjgl-2.9.0.jar;F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl_util\2.9.0\lwjgl_util-2.9.0.jar;F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\versions\1.6.4-Forge9.11.1.965\1.6.4-Forge9.11.1.965.jar net.minecraft.client.main.Main  --username a8105 --session ${auth_session} --version 1.6.4-Forge9.11.1.965 --gameDir F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft --assetsDir F:\MC\1.6.4\.minecraft\assets\virtual\legacy --tweakClass cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
复制代码求解..虽然能启动客户端,可是没加载forge

replies.author: lcpg
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2014-4-24 09:26
mainClass: net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch
今晚我去试试..

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2014-4-24 09:26
mainClass: net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch
请问是需要加上这个么..放在哪里= =?我放在最后无效

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2014-4-24 09:26
mainClass: net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch
找到原因了..把最后的开头的net.minecraft.client.main.Main换成mainClass: 的后面那些就可以了..

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2014-4-24 09:26
mainClass: net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch
换了直接不能启动了..求解
